underlying_goal: To update a figure in the main text of a research paper to include a new data series for an adversarially-trained Lie Detector.
primary_success: Claude correctly identified that the necessary data wasn't in the usual source file, hardcoded the values from the provided markdown file directly into the plotting script, updated the figure, and updated the corresponding caption in the main LaTeX file.
brief_summary: The user requested an update to a figure in the paper to include a new data series (an adversarially-trained lie detector). Claude located the relevant figure generation code, incorporated the new data from a separate results file, modified the plotting script to add the new series with a distinct color, updated the figure caption in the LaTeX source, and regenerated the figure.
